Self.Wiki: Determines the draw distance scale configuration for the FPS load balancer.

DrawDist_LvBegin.Wiki: The start activation level for the draw distance scaling.

DrawDist_LvEnd.Wiki: The end activation level for the draw distance scaling.

ShadwDrawDist_LvBegin.Wiki: The start activation level for the draw distance scaling of shadows.

ShadwDrawDist_LvEnd.Wiki: The end activation level for the draw distance scaling of shadows.

ShadwDrawDist_ScaleBegin.Wiki: The start draw distance scale for shadows.

ShadwDrawDist_ScaleEnd.Wiki: The end draw distance scale for shadows.
